typedef struct VkDeviceGroupSubmitInfo {
    VkStructureType    sType;
    const void*        pNext;
    uint32_t           waitSemaphoreCount;
    const uint32_t*    pWaitSemaphoreDeviceIndices;

    uint32_t           signalSemaphoreCount;

} VkDeviceGroupSubmitInfo;
